solution_line_template: Riley has {riley_fewer} fewer pairs of shoes than Ellie’s {ellie_shoes}, so {ellie_shoes} – {riley_fewer} = <<{ellie_shoes}-{riley_fewer}={riley_shoes}>>{riley_shoes} pairs of shoes.
Together, they have Ellie’s {ellie_shoes} + Riley’s {riley_shoes} = <<{ellie_shoes}+{riley_shoes}={total_shoes}>>{total_shoes} pairs of shoes.
